comments: Took the class as an elective and had much more work than expected. Doesn\'t prepare you much for projects and very unclear on expectations. Definitely don\'t recommend if you aren\'t already proficient in photoshop.

comments: The class isn\'t horrible but I found it irrelevant unless you are some sort of graphic design or art major. She talked wayyyy to much and the workload was over kill for the fact that this class is a design elective.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: Professor Savage was a great teacher! She was always willing to help or explain something that you don\'t understand. I loved her class, but you definitely need to work hard and keep up on the work load. There will be a lot of work, but the end portfolio is definitely worth it. As long as you keep up on the assignments at the beginning, you\'ll be ok

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This class is very interesting you learn how to use photoshop and design your own magazine on something that interests you. Professor Savage is very helpful if you are having a hard time. There isn\'t to much homework besides your creative thoughts and readings that you can use on quizzes. The class was an easy A I recommend it!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: While I think she cares about the class, she lectures way too much for a class that is suppose to be exploring your ideas and creativity. Literally a quiz every class almost on book readings that are a waste of my time to read , not in terms of doing well on the quiz\'s, but as far as overall content learned, they are useless. Could be a lot better.

comments: Don\'t have class with this teacher. she is a secretary and doesn\'t know what shes doing... way to much work not worth the credit or the money.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She\'s awful at explaining the assignments, which become boring and monotonous. She has a by-the-book / conformist personality, yet tries to teach creativity. Uggh, I was sick of her class after a week.
